name: uswds-prototype
description: A jekyll template for prototyping USWDS based websites.

scripts.build: mkdir -p _site/assets/vendor && cp -R node_modules/uswds/src/fonts node_modules/uswds/src/img _site/assets/ && cp node_modules/uswds/dist/js/uswds.min.js _site/assets/vendor/ && jekyll build

author: Aaron D Borden <adborden@a14n.net>
